metadata.synopsis: One of the waveservants, singing on the funeral. Won't talk to a player during the funeral, won't tell much after that too.After the Beastmaster quest is completed, the ceremony is no longer going on, so they have a different dialog then.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. Talk to one of the waveservants-246.957; 6.5; -264.804

0.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
0.text: Umberlee will surely watch over you after what you did for her. Thank you
0.context: NodeContext: Warmly as the player helped them

1.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

2.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Interrupted while singing a funeral requiemNodeContext: Ecstatic

3.speaker: Dark Breaker Sherrill
3.text: Umberlee heard our song - I know Holli's safe with her now.
3.context: NodeContext: Sad for her friend but pleased with their song
